name: Saviel
content:
Saviel was a female Human Sith Lord who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. She was present on Vaiken Spacedock.
Lord Saviel appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011. She is involved in the Sith Inquisitor class missions "Taking Inquisitor" and "Battles to Be Won," which are the ending missions for Chapters 1 and 2 of the class storyline respectively and see players visit Saviel—who does not speak—to receive a small reward.
